Headphones_eeg.json.TaskDescription: Subjects sat still with eyes open and listened to click train stimulation of the ASSR protocol at 40 Hz in headphones.
Headphones_eeg.json.Instructions: The subject was asked to be relaxed, not move, keep their eyes open, watch the fixation cross, and passively listen to a series of auditory clicks.

SpeakersArtifact_eeg.json.TaskDescription: Subjects sat still with eyes open and listened to click train stimulation of the ASSR protocol at 40 Hz on speakers.
SpeakersArtifact_eeg.json.Instructions: The subject was asked to be relaxed, not move, keep their eyes open, watch the fixation cross, and passively listen to a series of auditory clicks.

Speakers_eeg.json.TaskDescription: Subjects sat with their eyes open, listened to click train stimulation of the ASSR protocol at 40 Hz on speakers, and randomly produced a muscle artifact.
Speakers_eeg.json.Instructions: The subject was asked to keep their eyes open, watch the fixation cross, randomly (without thinking) clench their jaw, frown, or both, and passively listen to a series of auditory clicks.
